blockquote.p: Requires: The order argument shall not be memory_order_acquire or memory_order_acq_rel.

discussion.p: In addition, memory_order_consume should be disallowed, since it doesn't meaningfully apply to store operations. It's already disallowed on the analogous atomic<T>::store. The proposed updated text would be:

blockquote.p: Requires: The order argument shall not be memory_order_consume, memory_order_acquire, or memory_order_acq_rel.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N3376.

blockquote.p:
-7- Requires: The order argument shall not be memory_order_consume, memory_order_acquire, nor memory_order_acq_rel.
-8- Effects: Atomically sets the value pointed to by object or by this to false. Memory is affected according to the value of order.
